translation.home.page.caption: Educative Ticketing Management System
translation.home.page.description: The system is intended to control learning process. Register right now and get free access to perform eLearning process with ETIMS LMS. You will get access to create projects and to be participants of them, assign tasks to your students or coworkers and lots of other stuff.
translation.label.username.email: Enter your username or email address
translation.label.you.have.not.added.courses.to.cate: You have not added courses to this category yet
translation.text.send.password: Enter your username or email password and we'll send you an email with your username and a link to reset your password.
translation.text.success.recover: We have sent you an email to your {{ email }} email account with the instructions to recover your password.
